Package net.happybrackets.device.sensors

Class HTS221

java.lang.Object
net.happybrackets.device.sensors.Sensor
net.happybrackets.device.sensors.HTS221
All Implemented Interfaces:
HumiditySensor, TemperatureSensor
public final class HTS221
extends Sensor
implements HumiditySensor, TemperatureSensor
The HTS221 is the humidity and temperature sensor on the Raspberry Pi Sensehat.
